name: Are you there? (Snappy Sloth)
description:
Available in English and French!

"Are you there?" is a game about a space agency employee who is the only link between the Earth, and a rocket flying to the moon.

We think of it as a mix between narrative game like the pretty good one "Lifeline", on mobile, and the defusing game "Keep Talking & Nobody Explodes" :).

As you will see, it's more a prototype/demo than a full game, because we have been too ambitious, so we will keep working on "Are you there?" to make a full game of it. Stay tuned!

CONTROLS :

  • Mouse
  • F11 : Toggle Fullscreen

KNOWN ISSUES :

  • We're aware of the fullscreen that is'nt totally one in 1920x1080. Sorry for that. It'll be one of our priority after the game jam version.
  • No music except Title Screen.

CREDITS :

  • A game developed by Snappy Sloth (run by Titaninette and Tipyx)
  • Initially done for the GithubGameOff 2020
